channel.title: Need Help With Shops
channel.description:
Ok I Am Trying To Add A New Shop Onto My Server... I Have The Npc Where I Want Him To Be But When I Click Talk to Or Trade With Nothing Happens... Can Anybody Help Me... Here Is What I Have Added Client.java [code]else if (NPCID == 551) { // Owner Shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 73; }[/code] Shops.cfg [code]shop = 73 @red@O@blu@W@dre@N@dbl@E@gre@R 2 2 13679 100 13211 100 13665 100 13664 100 8001 100 15352 100 4087 100 15195 100 10109 100 10110 100 10111 100 10112 100 10113 100 10114 100 10115 100 10116 100 773 100 13214 100 13845 100 [/code]
And Autospawn.cfg [code]spawn = 551 3212 3222 0 0 0 0 0 2 Owner Shop[/code] Have I Missed Anything??? Please Help ;) Thanks :D

item.title: Need Help With Shops
item.dc:creator: @mikeyboy09 mikeyboy09
item.description:
@mikeyboy09 wrote:

Ok I Am Trying To Add A New Shop Onto My Server…
I Have The Npc Where I Want Him To Be But When I Click Talk to Or Trade With Nothing Happens…
Can Anybody Help Me…
Here Is What I Have Added
Client.java

else if (NPCID == 551) { // Owner Shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 73; }
Shops.cfg

shop = 73 @red@O@blu@W@dre@N@dbl@E@gre@R 2 2 13679 100 13211 100 13665 100 13664 100 8001 100 15352 100 4087 100 15195 100 10109 100 10110 100 10111 100 10112 100 10113 100 10114 100 10115 100 10116 100 773 100 13214 100 13845 100

And Autospawn.cfg

spawn = 551	3212	3222	0	0	0	0	0	2	Owner Shop

Have I Missed Anything???
Please Help
Thanks

Read full topic
